targets.expr: topk($TopResources, (100 * sum by (cluster, svm) (volume_size_used{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",svm=~"$TopSVMUsed"}) /   sum by (cluster, svm) (volume_size_total{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",svm=~"$TopSVMUsed"})))

topk($TopResources, (100 * sum by (cluster, svm) (volume_size_used{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",svm=~"$TopSVMUsed"}) /   sum by (cluster, svm) (volume_size_total{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",svm=~"$TopSVMUsed"})))

list.definition: query_result(topk($TopResources,(100 * sum by (cluster, svm) (volume_size_used{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",svm=~"$SVM"}) /   sum by (cluster, svm) (volume_size_total{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",svm=~"$SVM"}))))
list.name: TopSVMUsed

query.query: query_result(topk($TopResources,(100 * sum by (cluster, svm) (volume_size_used{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",svm=~"$SVM"}) /   sum by (cluster, svm) (volume_size_total{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",svm=~"$SVM"}))))
